text: Cerodrillia brasiliensis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Drilliidae.Bouchet, P. (2016). Cerodrillia brasiliensis Fallon, 2016. In: MolluscaBase (2015). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=871940 on 2016-07-31 ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 5.5 mm and 9.5 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off South Brasil. ==References== * Fallon P.J. (2016). Taxonomic review of tropical western Atlantic shallow water Drilliidae (Mollusca: Gastropoda: Conoidea) including descriptions of 100 new species. Zootaxa. 4090(1): 1-363 ==External links== * brasiliensis Category:Gastropods described in 2016
title: Cerodrillia brasiliensis
